1110100010000010 1100100011011000 1 -> sum: 1011000101011011, cout: 1
0100011101011111 0111001111011010 1 -> sum: 1011101100111010, cout: 0
0110100101010010 0001011111111001 0 -> sum: 1000000101001011, cout: 0
1010110101011100 1111110110011110 0 -> sum: 1010101011111010, cout: 1
0110110110111110 0101100101001101 1 -> sum: 1100011100001100, cout: 0
1010111001101001 0110111001011001 0 -> sum: 0001110011000010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
